translations.source: 2025年6月30日，上海城投水务(集团)有限公司组织成立了验收工作组，对泰和污水处理厂扩建工程THK1.1标(污水处理厂土建工程)进行了竣工验收。验收组通过实地检查以及参建各方提供的相关技术资料的查看，一致认为已经完成合同范围内的工程量，工程质量符合国家相关标准及规范,质保资料基本齐全、未发生安全质量事故，工程质量满足设计要求，验收组同意通过验收。
translations.target: On June 30, 2025, Shanghai Chengtou Water (Group) Co., Ltd. organized and established an acceptance working group to conduct the completion acceptance for Contract Section THK1.1 (wastewater treatment plant civil works) of the Taihe Wastewater Treatment Plant Expansion Project. Based on on-site inspection and review of the relevant technical documents provided by all participating parties, the acceptance team unanimously determined that the work quantities within the scope of the contract have been completed; the project quality complies with applicable national standards and specifications; the quality assurance documentation is basically complete; no safety or quality incidents occurred; and the project quality meets the design requirements. The acceptance team agreed to pass the acceptance.
Conclusion of the project completion acceptance:

translations.source: 泰和污水处理厂扩建工程THK1.1标(污水处理厂土建工程)工程已完成合同约定的各项内容，质量符合国家和地方有关标准及设计要求。同意竣工验收。
translations.target: Contract Section THK1.1 (wastewater treatment plant civil works) of the Taihe Wastewater Treatment Plant Expansion Project has completed all items stipulated in the contract, and the quality complies with relevant national and local standards as well as the design requirements. Completion acceptance is approved.
